languages.text: "Что же вы сразу по больному... Давайте считать это прихотью Лорд-капитана".
"You simply have to hit every nerve you come across, don't you? Let's just chalk this one up to the Lord Captain's whims."
languages.original_text: "Что же вы сразу по больному... Давайте считать это прихотью Лорд-капитана".

languages.text: "Ihr müsst wirklich unbedingt jeden Nerv treffen, der Euch begegnet, nicht wahr? Schreiben wir das einfach mal den Launen des Lord Captains zu."
languages.original_text: "You simply have to hit every nerve you come across, don't you? Let's just chalk this one up to the Lord Captain's whims."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst wirklich unbedingt jeden Nerv treffen, der Euch begegnet, nicht wahr? Schreiben wir das einfach mal den Launen des Lord Captains zu."

languages.text: « Décidément, le tact et la diplomatie ne sont pas votre tasse de thé. Contentons-nous de mettre cette lubie sur le compte du caractère fantasque {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "You simply have to hit every nerve you come across, don't you? Let's just chalk this one up to the Lord Captain's whims."

traits.locale_text: « Décidément, le tact et la diplomatie ne sont pas votre tasse de thé. Contentons-nous de mettre cette lubie sur le compte du caractère fantasque {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: «Tiene que meter el dedo en todas las llagas, ¿verdad? Achaquémoslo a un capricho de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y dejemos el tema».
languages.original_text: "You simply have to hit every nerve you come across, don't you? Let's just chalk this one up to the Lord Captain's whims."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene que meter el dedo en todas las llagas, ¿verdad? Achaquémoslo a un capricho de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán y dejemos el tema».

languages.text: 「ただ単に、出くわすすべての神経を逆撫でしなければならないだけでしょう？これはロード・キャプテンの気まぐれということにしておこう」
languages.original_text: "You simply have to hit every nerve you come across, don't you? Let's just chalk this one up to the Lord Captain's whims."

traits.locale_text: 「ただ単に、出くわすすべての神経を逆撫でしなければならないだけだろう？これはロード・キャプテンの気まぐれということにしておこう」

languages.text: “你还真是什么事情都要问个清楚，是吧？就把这当成是舰长大人一时心血来潮吧。”
languages.original_text: "You simply have to hit every nerve you come across, don't you? Let's just chalk this one up to the Lord Captain's whims."

traits.locale_text: “你还真是什么事情都要问个清楚，是吧？就把这当成是舰长大人一时心血来潮吧。”

languages.text: "Önüne gelen herkesin canını sıkmak zorundasın, değil mi? Bu hususu Lord Kaptan'ın heveslerine bağlayabiliriz."
languages.original_text: "You simply have to hit every nerve you come across, don't you? Let's just chalk this one up to the Lord Captain's whims."
